verses.verse: Whoever loves <S%H157><s%> discipline <S%H4148><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> But he who hates <S%H8130><s%> reproof <S%H9640><s%> is stupid. <S%H1198><s%>

A good <S%H2896><s%> man <S%H2896><s%> will obtain <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> But He will condemn <S%H7561><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> who devises <S%H4209><s%> evil. <S%H4209><s%>
A man <S%H120><s%> will not be established <S%H3559><s%> by wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> But the root <S%H8328><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will not be moved. <S%H4131><s%>
An excellent <S%H2428><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> is the crown <S%H5850><s%> of her husband, <S%H1167><s%> But she who shames <S%H954><s%> [him] is as rottenness <S%H7538><s%> in his bones. <S%H6106><s%>
The thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> are just, <S%H4941><s%> [But] the counsels <S%H8458><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are deceitful. <S%H4820><s%>

The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> for blood, <S%H1818><s%> But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> will deliver <S%H5337><s%> them.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are overthrown <S%H2015><s%> and are no <S%H369><s%> more, But the house <S%H1004><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will stand. <S%H5975><s%>
A man <S%H376><s%> will be praised <S%H1984><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his insight, <S%H7922><s%> But one of perverse <S%H9389><s%> mind <S%H3820><s%> will be despised. <S%H937><s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is he who is lightly <S%H7034><s%> esteemed <S%H7034><s%> and has a servant, <S%H5650><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> he who honors <S%H3513><s%> himself and lacks <S%H2638><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>

A righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> has <S%H3045><s%> regard <S%H3045><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of his beast, <S%H929><s%> But the compassion <S%H7356><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is cruel. <S%H394><s%>

He who tills <S%H5647><s%> his land <S%H127><s%> will have <S%H7646><s%> plenty <S%H7646><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> But he who pursues <S%H7291><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> [things] lacks <S%H2638><s%> sense. <S%H3820><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> desires <S%H2530><s%> the booty <S%H9285><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men, <S%H7451><s%> But the root <S%H8328><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> yields <S%H5414><s%> [fruit.]

An evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H7451><s%> is ensnared <S%H4170><s%> by the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of his lips, <S%H8193><s%> But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will escape <S%H3318><s%> from trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

A man <S%H376><s%> will be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with good <S%H9185><s%> by the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of his words, <S%H6310><s%> And the deeds <S%H1576><s%> of a man's hands <S%H3027><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to him.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of a fool <S%H191><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes, <S%H5869><s%> But a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H2450><s%> is he who listens <S%H8085><s%> to counsel. <S%H6098><s%>
A fool's vexation <S%H3708><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> at once, <S%H3117><s%> But a prudent <S%H6175><s%> man <S%H6175><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> dishonor. <S%H7036><s%>
He who speaks <S%H6315><s%> truth <S%H530><s%> tells <S%H5046><s%> what <S%H6664><s%> is right, <S%H6664><s%> But a false <S%H8267><s%> witness, <S%H5707><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>

There <S%H3426><s%> is one who speaks <S%H981><s%> rashly <S%H981><s%> like the thrusts <S%H4094><s%> of a sword, <S%H2719><s%> But the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> brings <S%H4832><s%> healing. <S%H4832><s%>
Truthful <S%H571><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> will be established <S%H3559><s%> forever, <S%H5703><s%> But a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> is only <S%H5704><s%> for a moment. <S%H9541><s%>
Deceit <S%H4820><s%> is in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of those who devise <S%H9177><s%> evil, <S%H9563><s%> But counselors <S%H3289><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> have joy. <S%H8057><s%>
No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> harm <S%H205><s%> befalls <S%H579><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> with trouble. <S%H9563><s%>
Lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> But those who deal <S%H6213><s%> faithfully <S%H530><s%> are His delight. <S%H7522><s%>
A prudent <S%H6175><s%> man <S%H120><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> But the heart <S%H3820><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> proclaims <S%H7121><s%> folly. <S%H200><s%>
The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H9167><s%> will rule, <S%H4910><s%> But the slack <S%H9559><s%> [hand] will be put to forced <S%H4522><s%> labor. <S%H4522><s%>

Anxiety <S%H1674><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> weighs <S%H7812><s%> it down, <S%H7812><s%> But a good <S%H2896><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> makes <S%H8055><s%> it glad. <S%H8055><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a guide <S%H8446><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> leads <S%H8582><s%> them astray. <S%H8582><s%>

A slothful <S%H9559><s%> man <S%H9559><s%> does not roast <S%H2760><s%> his prey, <S%H6718><s%> But the precious <S%H3368><s%> possession <S%H1952><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> [is] diligence. <S%H9167><s%>
In the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is life, <S%H9132><s%> And in [its] pathway <S%H1870><s%> <S%H5410><s%> there is no <S%H408><s%> death. <S%H4194><s%>
